response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am confident it's worth more than its face value of $1,000,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value proposition, allowing you to leverage the product's capabilities while saving $50,000 compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.", "product_price": 950000}
